00030 DiagramComponent::DiagramComponent(LibraryInterface* lh_, 
00031                                                                    QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00032                                    const QString &instanceName,
00033                                                                    const QString &displayName,
00034                                    const QString &description,
00035                                    const QMap<QString, QString> &configurableElementValues,
00036                                    QGraphicsItem *parent):
00037 ComponentItem(QRectF(-GridSize * 8, 0, GridSize * 8 * 2, 40), component, instanceName, displayName,
00038               description, configurableElementValues, parent),
00039 lh_(lh_), hierIcon_(0), oldColumn_(0), leftPorts_(), rightPorts_(), connUpdateDisabled_(false)
00040 {
00041     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00042     
00043         QList<QSharedPointer<BusInterface> > busInterfaces
00044             = component->getBusInterfaces().values();
00045 
00046     int portSpacing = 3*GridSize;
00047     int portCountLeft = busInterfaces.size() / 2.0 + .5;
00048     setRect(-GridSize*8, 0, GridSize * 8 * 2, 
00049             6 * GridSize + portSpacing * std::max(portCountLeft - 1, 0));
00050 
00051     bool right = false;
00052     int leftY = 4 * GridSize;
00053     int rightY = 4 * GridSize;
00054 
00055     foreach (QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busif, busInterfaces) {
00056         DiagramPort *port = new DiagramPort(busif, lh_, this);
00057 
00058         // If this is a platform component, place master bus interfaces to the right
00059         // and slave bus interfaces to the left.
00060         if (componentModel()->getComponentImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW &&
00061             componentModel()->getComponentSWType() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_PLATFORM)
00062         {
00063             if (busif->getInterfaceMode() == General::MASTER)
00064             {
00065                 right = true;
00066             }
00067             else
00068             {
00069                 right = false;
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         connect(port, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00074 
00075         if (right) {
00076             port->setPos(QPointF(rect().width(), rightY) + rect().topLeft());
00077             rightY += portSpacing;
00078         } else {
00079             port->setPos(QPointF(0, leftY) + rect().topLeft());
00080             leftY += portSpacing;
00081         }
00082 
00083         onAddPort(port, right);
00084         right = !right;
00085     }
00086 
00087     updateSize();
00088     updateComponent();
00089 }

00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: ~DiagramComponent()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 DiagramComponent::~DiagramComponent()
00095 {
00096     // Remove all interconnections.
00097     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, childItems()) {
00098         if (item->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00099             continue;
00100 
00101         DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00102         foreach (DiagramInterconnection *interconn, diagramPort->getInterconnections()) {
00103             delete interconn;
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     // Remove this item from the column where it resides.
00108     DiagramColumn* column = dynamic_cast<DiagramColumn*>(parentItem());
00109 
00110     if (column != 0)
00111     {
00112         column->removeItem(this);
00113     }
00114 
00115         emit destroyed(this);
00116 }

00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 // Function: getBusPort()
00120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 DiagramPort *DiagramComponent::getBusPort(const QString &name)
00122 {
00123     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, QGraphicsRectItem::children()) {
00124         if (item->type() == DiagramPort::Type) {
00125             DiagramPort *busPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00126             if (busPort->name() == name)
00127                 return busPort;
00128         }
00129     }
00130 
00131     return 0;
00132 }

00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00136 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 void DiagramComponent::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00138 {
00139     // Discard movement if the diagram is protected.
00140     if (static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00141     {
00142         return;
00143     }
00144 
00145     // Disable connection updates so that Qt does not update the connections
00146     // before the possible column change has been done.
00147     connUpdateDisabled_ = true;
00148 
00149     ComponentItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00150     
00151     if (oldColumn_ != 0)
00152     {
00153         setPos(parentItem()->mapFromScene(oldColumn_->mapToScene(pos())));
00154 
00155         DiagramColumn* column = dynamic_cast<DiagramColumn*>(parentItem());
00156         Q_ASSERT(column != 0);
00157         column->onMoveItem(this, oldColumn_);
00158     }
00159 
00160     connUpdateDisabled_ = false;
00161 
00162     // Update the port connections manually.
00163     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, childItems())
00164     {
00165         if (item->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00166             continue;
00167 
00168         DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00169         foreach (DiagramInterconnection *interconn, diagramPort->getInterconnections())
00170         {
00171             interconn->updatePosition();
00172         }
00173     }
00174 }

00176 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00178 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 void DiagramComponent::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00180 {
00181     ComponentItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00182     setZValue(0.0);
00183 
00184     if (oldColumn_ != 0)
00185     {
00186         DiagramColumn* column = dynamic_cast<DiagramColumn*>(parentItem());
00187         Q_ASSERT(column != 0);
00188         column->onReleaseItem(this);
00189 
00190         oldColumn_ = 0;
00191 
00192         QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00193 
00194         if (scenePos() != oldPos_)
00195         {
00196             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new ItemMoveCommand(this, oldPos_));
00197         }
00198         else
00199         {
00200             cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00201         }
00202 
00203         // End the position update for the interconnections.
00204         foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, childItems())
00205         {
00206             if (item->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00207                 continue;
00208 
00209             DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00210             foreach (DiagramInterconnection *conn, diagramPort->getInterconnections())
00211             {
00212                 conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00213             }
00214         }
00215 
00216         // Add the undo command to the edit stack only if it has at least some real changes.
00217         if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || scenePos() != oldPos_)
00218         {
00219             column->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd, false);
00220         }
00221     }
00222 }

00224 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00226 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 void DiagramComponent::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00228 {
00229     ComponentItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00230     setZValue(1001.0);
00231 
00232     oldPos_ = scenePos();
00233     oldColumn_ = dynamic_cast<DiagramColumn*>(parentItem());
00234 
00235     // Begin the position update for the interconnections.
00236     foreach (QGraphicsItem *item, childItems())
00237     {
00238         if (item->type() != DiagramPort::Type)
00239             continue;
00240 
00241         DiagramPort *diagramPort = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramPort *>(item);
00242         foreach (DiagramInterconnection *conn, diagramPort->getInterconnections())
00243         {
00244             conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00245         }
00246     }
00247 }

00249 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 // Function: onAddPort()
00251 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 void DiagramComponent::onAddPort(DiagramPort* port, bool right)
00253 {
00254     if (right)
00255     {
00256         rightPorts_.append(port);
00257         VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(rightPorts_, port, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00258         VCollisionLayout::setItemPos(rightPorts_, port, rect().right(), MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00259     }
00260     else
00261     {
00262         leftPorts_.append(port);
00263         VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(leftPorts_, port, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00264         VCollisionLayout::setItemPos(leftPorts_, port, rect().left(), MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00268 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00269 // Function: onMovePort()
00270 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 void DiagramComponent::onMovePort(DiagramPort* port)
00272 {
00273     // Remove the port from the stacks (this simplifies code).
00274     leftPorts_.removeAll(port);
00275     rightPorts_.removeAll(port);
00276 
00277     // Restrict the position so that the port cannot be placed too high.
00278     port->setPos(snapPointToGrid(port->x(), std::max(MIN_Y_PLACEMENT - port->boundingRect().top(), port->y())));
00279     
00280     // Check on which side the port is to determine the stack to which it should be placed.
00281     if (port->x() < 0.0)
00282     {
00283         VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(leftPorts_, port, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00284     }
00285     else
00286     {
00287         VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(rightPorts_, port, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00288     }
00289 
00290     updateSize();
00291 }

00293 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00294 // Function: addPort()
00295 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00296 DiagramPort* DiagramComponent::addPort(QPointF const& pos)
00297 {
00298     // Determine a unique name for the bus interface.
00299     QString name = "bus";
00300     unsigned int count = 0;
00301 
00302     while (componentModel()->getBusInterface(name) != 0)
00303     {
00304         ++count;
00305         name = "bus_" + QString::number(count);
00306     }
00307 
00308     // Create an empty bus interface and add it to the component model.
00309     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf(new BusInterface());
00310     busIf->setName(name);
00311     busIf->setInterfaceMode(General::MODE_UNDEFINED);
00312     componentModel()->addBusInterface(busIf);
00313 
00314     // Create the visualization for the bus interface.
00315     DiagramPort* port = new DiagramPort(busIf, lh_, this);
00316     port->setPos(mapFromScene(pos));
00317     onAddPort(port, mapFromScene(pos).x() >= 0);
00318 
00319     // Update the component size.
00320     updateSize();
00321     return port;
00322 }
00323 
00324 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 // Function: addPort()
00326 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00327 void DiagramComponent::addPort(DiagramPort* port)
00328 {
00329     port->setParentItem(this);
00330 
00331     // Add the bus interface to the component.
00332     componentModel()->addBusInterface(port->getBusInterface());
00333 
00334     // Make preparations.
00335     onAddPort(port, port->x() >= 0);
00336 
00337     // Update the component size.
00338     updateSize();
00339 }
00340 
00341 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00342 // Function: updateSize()
00343 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00344 void DiagramComponent::updateSize()
00345 {
00346     // Update the component's size based on the port that is positioned at
00347     // the lowest level of them all.
00348     qreal maxY = 4 * GridSize;
00349 
00350     if (!leftPorts_.empty())
00351     {
00352         maxY = leftPorts_.back()->y();
00353     }
00354 
00355     if (!rightPorts_.empty())
00356     {
00357         maxY = std::max(maxY, rightPorts_.back()->y());
00358     }
00359 
00360     setRect(-GridSize * 8, 0, GridSize * 8 * 2, maxY + 2 * GridSize);
00361 
00362     DiagramColumn* column = dynamic_cast<DiagramColumn*>(parentItem());
00363 
00364     if (column != 0)
00365     {
00366         column->updateItemPositions();
00367     }
00368 }

00370 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00371 // Function: updateComponent()
00372 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00373 void DiagramComponent::updateComponent()
00374 {
00375     ComponentItem::updateComponent();
00376 
00377     VLNV* vlnv = componentModel()->getVlnv();
00378 
00379     // Check whether the component is packaged (valid vlnv) or not.
00380     if (vlnv->isValid())
00381     {
00382         if (componentModel()->isBus())
00383             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xce,0xdf,0xff))); 
00384         else
00385             setBrush(QBrush(QColor(0xa5,0xc3,0xef)));
00386     }
00387     else
00388     {
00389         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(217, 217, 217)));
00390     }
00391 
00392     // Create a hierarchy icon if the component is a hierarchical one.
00393     if (componentModel()->getModel()->hasHierView())
00394     {
00395         if (hierIcon_ == 0)
00396         {
00397             hierIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/hierarchy.png"), this);
00398             hierIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Hierarchical"));
00399             hierIcon_->setPos(58, 6);
00400         }
00401     }
00402     else if (hierIcon_ != 0)
00403     {
00404         delete hierIcon_;
00405     }
00406 }

00408 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00409 // Function: removePort()
00410 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00411 void DiagramComponent::removePort(DiagramPort* port)
00412 {
00413     leftPorts_.removeAll(port);
00414     rightPorts_.removeAll(port);
00415     updateSize();
00416     
00417     componentModel()->removeBusInterface(port->getBusInterface().data());
00418 }

00423 bool DiagramComponent::isConnectionUpdateDisabled() const
